title: Best of The Program | Guest: Todd Bensman | 9/23/21
description:
New evidence shows how Biden’s handlers were in fact hiding him during the election, and they’re still hiding him. Author Todd Bensman joins to explain what the media’s hiding about the Haitian migrant crisis. Glenn breaks down how you can prepare for the “new normal” as Biden ushers it in.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
